overview:
Ryan is a flight nurse that suffers from the inability to accept the status quo. His daily frustrations with the suboptimal patient outcomes of the current patient transfer process motivated him to create a better system.

In the past 17 years, Ryan has held nearly every job in an Emergency Department. He has been recognized by AAMS, ENA, and ASTNA as an industry leader in acute care coordination. As an entrepreneur, his motivation and coachability was recently recognized by NACET.org with the coveted “Fast Start” award.

To clear his head of ROI and Lean Startup testing, he heads to the mountains on bikes, skis and sometimes unicycles.
